See https://github.com/rfjakob/gocryptfs/wiki/Release-Tarballs for what to download.

[Changelog](https://github.com/rfjakob/gocryptfs#changelog)

#### Which file should I download?

| File                                    | Contains |
| ---                                     | --- |
| gocryptfs_vX.Y.Z_linux-static_amd64.tar.gz | Standalone 64-bit Linux binary and manpage, compatible with all distributions |
| gocryptfs_vX.Y.Z_src.tar.gz                | gocryptfs source code |
| gocryptfs_vX.Y.Z_src-deps.tar.gz           | gocryptfs source code plus all dependencies (in the `vendor` dir) |
| *.asc                                   | gpg file signature ([how to verify](https://nuetzlich.net/gocryptfs/releases/#verify-binaries)) |

[Download statistics (via jessedp)](https://jessedp.github.io/github-release-stats/?username=rfjakob&repository=gocryptfs)
